query:
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, m.organizationId, m.role, o.name as org_name
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN memberships m ON u.id = m.userId
LEFT JOIN organizations o ON m.organizationId = o.id
WHERE u.email = 'mariomicrotel@gmail.com';
command:

FROM users u
